title: IIM Ahmedabad launches blended MBA programme in Business Analytics and AI
description: IIM Ahmedabad has introduced a new two-year blended MBA program focusing on Business Analytics and Artificial Intelligence. This innovative degree is designed for professionals and entrepreneurs. It aims to equip them with advanced analytical and AI capabilities alongside leadership and strategy skills. The program combines online learning with on-campus modules.

title: Advanced AUV and Survey Boats: Navy commissions INS Ikshak, marks a new era in deep-sea mapping
description: At the heart of Ikshak's operations is its Autonomous Underwater Vehicle, designed for unmanned hydrographic missions at depths.INS Ikshak, Autonomous Underwater Vehicle (AUV), hydrographic survey vessel, Indian Navy ocean mapping, sea bed mapping technology, deep sea exploration AUV, unmanned hydrographic missions, hydrographic charts importance, sonar imaging technology, INS Ikshak commissioning, India's maritime capabilities, GRSE built survey vessels, naval hydrographic research, artificial intelligence in naval applications, large language models in hydrography
content: Kochi: At the rear of the Indian Navy’s newly commissioned INS Ikshak rests a striking, five-metre-long orange capsule, which is sleek, cylindrical, and packed with advanced sensors and high-resolution cameras. It may appear still for now, but once d... [4793 chars]

title: Does King Charles use AI? Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang reveals the monarch’s mysterious letter on the future of Artificial Intelligence
description: At the 2025 Queen Elizabeth Prize for Engineering ceremony at St Jamess Palace, King Charles III discussed artificial intelligence with Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang, sparking curiosity about whether the monarch uses AI himself. As reported the King handed Huang a letter stressing AI safety and ethics. The event also honoured global innovators, including Professor Fei-Fei Li and AI pioneers Geoffrey Hinton, Yoshua Bengio, Yann LeCun, and John Hopfield.
content:

title: AI can speed antibody design to thwart novel viruses
description: Artificial intelligence (AI) and "protein language" models can speed the design of monoclonal antibodies that prevent or reduce the severity of potentially life-threatening viral infections, according to a multi-institutional study led by researchers at Vanderbilt University Medical Center.

title: Microsoft lays out ambitious AI vision, free from OpenAI
description: The tech giant forms a team led by Microsoft AI chief Mustafa Suleyman to build top artificial-intelligence systems and distance itself from its longtime partner.
content:
In a blog post and interview, Microsoft AI Chief Executive Mustafa Suleyman offered a window into Microsoft’s plans to develop AI self-sufficiency from OpenAI, which is embedded into many of the products it offers to its customers.

title: Mark Zuckerberg and Priscilla Chan Restructure Their Philanthropy
description: The Chan Zuckerberg Initiative said its restructured organization, Biohub, would lead its focus on artificial intelligence and scientific research.

title: Artificial Intelligence Hits The Grid As Utilities Race To Keep Up
description: Utilities like National Grid, Duke Energy, and AES are investing in AI to modernize grids, improve reliability, and prepare for electrification growth.
